metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20406 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Modules/_pickle.c in Python before 3.7.1 has an integer overflow via a large LONG_BINPUT value that is mishandled during a "resize to twice the size" attempt. This issue might cause memory exhaustion, but is only relevant if the pickle format is used for serializing tens or hundreds of gigabytes of data. This issue is fixed in: v3.4.10, v3.4.10rc1; v3.5.10, v3.5.10rc1, v3.5.7, v3.5.7rc1, v3.5.8, v3.5.8rc1, v3.5.8rc2, v3.5.9; v3.6.10, v3.6.10rc1, v3.6.11, v3.6.11rc1, v3.6.12, v3.6.7, v3.6.7rc1, v3.6.7rc2, v3.6.8, v3.6.8rc1, v3.6.9, v3.6.9rc1; v3.7.1, v3.7.1rc1, v3.7.1rc2, v3.7.2, v3.7.2rc1, v3.7.3, v3.7.3rc1, v3.7.4, v3.7.4rc1, v3.7.4rc2, v3.7.5, v3.7.5rc1, v3.7.6, v3.7.6rc1, v3.7.7, v3.7.7rc1, v3.7.8, v3.7.8rc1, v3.7.9.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20406` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

idle-python2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
libpython2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
libpython2.7-minimal - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
libpython2.7-stdlib - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
libpython2.7-testsuite - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
python2.7 - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
python2.7-examples - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
python2.7-minimal - 2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4
No subscription required

idle-python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
libpython3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
libpython3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
libpython3.5-stdlib - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
libpython3.5-testsuite - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
python3.5 - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
python3.5-examples - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
python3.5-minimal - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
python3.5-venv - 3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> bug says 2.7 is not affected

criterions.comment: python2.7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.12-1ubuntu0~16.04.4').
python3.5 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.2-2ubuntu0~16.04.8').
